articles.title: In Photos And Videos: See A Jaw-Dropping Eclipsed Sunset Sink Into The Pacific Ocean - Forbes
articles.description: The first eclipse of the Sun of 2022 saw South America enjoys some spectacular sights as 54% of our star was blocked by the Moon during a partial solar eclipse.
articles.content:
A partially eclipse sunset captured by expert eclipse photographer Jörg Schoppmeyer as seen from ... [+] Vina del Mar in Chile on April 30, 2022.

articles.title: Amber Heard may take the stand in defamation trial - Good Morning America
articles.description: Heard is being sued by her ex-husband, Johnny Depp, for defamation, and she is countersuing him. They both accuse each other of domestic abuse.

Skywatchers across parts of the Southern Hemisphere were treated to the first partial eclipse of the year today.

articles.title: The first solar eclipse of 2022 has begun and here's the view! - Space.com
articles.description: Live broadcasts bring the eclipse from South America worldwide.
articles.content:
It's the moment skywatchers have been waiting for: The year's first solar eclipse has begun.
